dict.string: Notate 只在你输入 "///" 后短暂记录你接下来的文字，用于快速记事。除触发内容外，我们不会保存其他按键。
Notate needs access to Calendar to automatically create events from your TODOs and meeting notes.
Notate needs full access to Calendar to create, update, and manage calendar events from your captured content.
Notate needs access to Reminders to automatically create tasks from your captured TODOs.
Notate needs full access to Reminders to create, update, and manage reminders from your captured content.
Notate needs access to Contacts to save contact information from your entries.
Notate uses your location to provide context-aware suggestions and nearby recommendations.
Notate needs permission to control Calendar, Reminders, Contacts, and Maps to navigate to your created items when you click "Jump".
